RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_MARGIN_COMPONENT.BRANCH_CODE AND LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_COMPONENT.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.CUSTOMER_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_COMPONENT.CUSTOMER_NO AND LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.COMPONENT = LFTMS_MARGIN_COMPONENT.COMPONENT

LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.BRANCH_CODE AND LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.CUSTOMER_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.CUSTOMER_NO AND LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.COMPONENT = LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.COMPONENT AND LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.CCY = LFTMS_MARGIN_CCY.CCY

LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.COMPONENT = LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.COMPONENT AND LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.EFFECTIVE_DATE = LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.EFFECTIVE_DATE AND LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.BRANCH_CODE AND LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.CUSTOMER_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.CUSTOMER_NO AND LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.CCY = LFTMS_MARGIN_EFFDATE.CCY

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, B.USER_REF_NO, A.BRANCH, B.CURRENCY FROM LFTMS_MARGIN_COMPONENT__1 B, OLTBS_CONTRACT A WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.LATEST_VERSION_NO = B.VERSION_NO AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'C' AND A.AUTH_STATUS = 'A' AND A.BRANCH = GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS NOT IN ('V', 'L') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM LBTBS_BORROWER_DRAWDOWN_MARGIN WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT C, LFTMS_MARGIN_COMPONENT__1 D WHERE C.CONTRACT_REF_NO = D.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND C.LATEST_VERSION_NO = D.VERSION_NO AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'C' AND C.BRANCH = GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH AND C.AUTH_STATUS = 'U' AND D.TRANCHE_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO IN (SELECT X.CONTRACT_REF_NO FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT X, OLVW_AVL_PROD_BR_USR Y, OLVW_USER_PRODUCTS S WHERE S.USER_ID = Y.USER_ID AND S.PRODUCT_CODE = Y.PRODUCT_CODE AND X.PRODUCT_CODE = Y.PRODUCT_CODE AND X.BRANCH = Y.BRANCH_CODE AND S.USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID)

SELECT DISTINCT B.CUSTOMER_NO, B.CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS A, OLTM_CUSTOMER B WHERE B.CUSTOMER_NO = A.CUSTOMER_NO AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND A.VERSION_NO = (SELECT MAX(VERSION_NO) FROM LBTBS_CONTRACT_BORROWERS WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = ?) UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'AL' FROM DUAL

SELECT DISTINCT A.MARGIN_COMPONENT, A.DESCRIPTION, A.MARGIN_TYPE FROM LFTMS_MARGIN_DEFINITION A, LBTBS_BORROWER_DRAWDOWN_MARGIN B WHERE A.MARGIN_COMPONENT = B.MARGIN_COMPONENT AND B.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND A.RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND A.MARGIN_BASIS = 'T'

SELECT A.CCY, B.CCY_NAME FROM LBTBS_BORROWER_CCY A, CYTMS_CCY_DEFN B, OLTBS_CONTRACT C WHERE A.CCY = B.CCY_CODE AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = C.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.VERSION_NO = C.LATEST_VERSION_NO AND NVL(A.BLOCK_CCY, 'N') <> 'Y' ORDER BY A.CCY

RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.BRANCH_CODE = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.BRANCH_CODE AND LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.CUSTOMER_NO = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.CUSTOMER_NO AND LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.COMPONENT = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.COMPONENT AND LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.EFFECTIVE_DATE = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.EFFECTIVE_DATE AND LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.FROM_BASIS_AMT = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.FROM_BASIS_AMT AND LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.TO_BASIS_AMT = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.TO_BASIS_AMT AND LFTMS_PARTICIPANT_MARGIN_RATE.CCY = LFTMS_MARGIN_RATE.CCY

RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.COUNTERPARTY PARTICIPANT, B.CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM LBTBS_PART_PROC_STAT A, OLTM_CUSTOMER B WHERE A.BORROWER_REF_NO = ? AND A.COUNTERPARTY = B.CUSTOMER_NO
